text: Atahpara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya, tabe apanake to amara edera raksaka kare patha'ini. Apanara kaja to sudhu bani paumche deya. Ara amara yakhana manusake amadera paksa theke kono rahamata asbadana kara'i takhana se ete utphulla haya ebam yakhana tadera krtakarmera jan'ya tadera bipada-apada ghate, takhana to manusa haye pare khuba'i akrtajna
